How I partner

Ways I help teams

From lab-grade evaluation to interactive storytelling that aligns stakeholders.

AI & perception

Evaluation blueprints

Psychophysics-style testbeds, human-in-the-loop audits, and decision-ready reporting for vision and multimodal systems.

  • Stress-tests for bias, brittleness & UX failure modes

Data storytelling

  • Rapid prototyping with real datasets
  • Executive-ready views & press assets
  • Embedded training for product teams

Learning & alignment

Workshops & advisory

Tailored sessions on perception science, experimental design, and audit methodology to align research, product, and policy stakeholders.

  • Hands-on measurement clinics
  • Executive briefings & roadmaps
  • Lab-to-product translation support
